blocks.name: invginvrid
blocks.content: Identity for a multiplication with additive and multiplicative inverses in a ring. (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm invginvrid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, co(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c6, c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cinvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmulr, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, co(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c6, c1)), c1, co(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3))), c6, c1), co(cfv(cur, c0), c6, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, co(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c6, c1)), co(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3))), c6, c1)), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd))
  ringmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  ringgrp(c0)
  unitcl(c3, c4, c2, c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c5)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c2))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c2), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c4))
  ringinvcl(c0, cfv(c5, c3), c4, c7, c2)
  simp2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  eqcomd(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, co(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c6, c1)), co(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3))), c6, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd), w3a(wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c2), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c2), wcel(c1, c2))))
  mndass(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(c5, c3), c2, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3)), c1, c6)
  mgpbas(c2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  mgpplusg(c6, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3))), c6, c1, cfv(cur, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c5, c3), c6, cfv(c7, cfv(c5, c3))), cfv(cur, c0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c4))
  simp1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cfv(c5, c3), c4))
  unitnegcl(c0, c3, c4, c5)
  unitrinv(c0, cfv(c5, c3), c4, c6, c7, cfv(cur, c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c0), c6, c1), c1))
  ringlidm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm invginvrid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)→((c5 ` c3)[c6]((c7 `(c5 ` c3))[c6]c1))= c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Unit ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(invg ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(invr ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(× ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(((c5 ` c3)[c6]((c7 `(c5 ` c3))[c6]c1)), c1, (((c5 ` c3)[c6](c7 `(c5 ` c3)))[c6]c1), ((1r ` c0)[c6]c1), (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), ((c5 ` c3)[c6]((c7 `(c5 ` c3))[c6]c1))=(((c5 ` c3)[c6](c7 `(c5 ` c3)))[c6]c1), (mulGrp ` c0)∈ Mnd, (c5 ` c3)∈ c2, (c7 `(c5 ` c3))∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ Mnd)
  ringmgp(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, (c5 ` c3)∈ c2)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Ring, c3 ∈ c4, (c5 ` c3)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2)
  ringgrp(c0)
  unitcl(c3, c4, c2, c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c5)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, (c7 `(c5 ` c3))∈ c2)
  syldan(c0 ∈ Ring, c3 ∈ c4, (c7 `(c5 ` c3))∈ c2, (c5 ` c3)∈ c4)
  ringinvcl(c0, (c5 ` c3), c4, c7, c2)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  eqcomd(((c5 ` c3)[c6]((c7 `(c5 ` c3))[c6]c1)), (((c5 ` c3)[c6](c7 `(c5 ` c3)))[c6]c1), ((mulGrp ` c0)∈ Mnd ∧((c5 ` c3)∈ c2 ∧(c7 `(c5 ` c3))∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))
  mndass((mulGrp ` c0), (c5 ` c3), c2, (c7 `(c5 ` c3)), c1, c6)
  mgpbas(c2, (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  mgpplusg(c6, (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  oveq1d(((c5 ` c3)[c6](c7 `(c5 ` c3))), c6, c1, (1r ` c0), (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), ((c5 ` c3)[c6](c7 `(c5 ` c3)))=(1r ` c0), c0 ∈ Ring, (c5 ` c3)∈ c4)
  simp1(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, (c5 ` c3)∈ c4)
  unitnegcl(c0, c3, c4, c5)
  unitrinv(c0, (c5 ` c3), c4, c6, c7, (1r ` c0))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, ((1r ` c0)[c6]c1)= c1)
  ringlidm(c0, c1, c2, (1r ` c0), c6)
  eqid((1r ` c0))
}
